item.title: [WICKET-6599] ResponseIOException should never escape from WicketFilter
item.description:
We are observing the stacktrace below in the logs on our systems. The problem is that Wicket wraps the IOException in a ReponseIOException and lets this exception escape from the filter. Undertow logs IOExceptions at debug, but the ReponseIOException is considered a real error and logged at error.
